IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: New Hampshire Theatre Project NHTP uses the art of theatre-making to spark conversation connect individuals and strengthen communities. NHTP provides a nurturing professional environment for youth artists and community members to be inspired and transformed through the art of theatre. We envision a community of individuals who are self-reflective articulate passionate and compassionate a community where differences are honored history and literature are explored as resources for problem-solving and difficult issues are negotiated with mutual respect and thoughtful community dialogue.
IRS990.MissionDesc: New Hampshire Theatre Project NHTP uses the art of theatre-making to spark conversation connect individuals and strengthen communities. NHTP provides a nurturing professional environment for youth artists and community members to be inspired and transformed through the art of theatre. We envision a community of individuals who are self-reflective articulate passionate and compassionate a community where differences are honored history and literature are explored as resources for problem-solving and difficult issues are negotiated with mutual respect and thoughtful community dialogue.
IRS990.Desc: NHTP produces theatre productions and presents guest artists at our home venue as well as touring at least one production annually throughout the state of New Hampshire. The Community Connectors Series presents facilitated public discussions about community themes featured in performances.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: NHTP offers workshops private coaching and classes for all ages at our home venue and other community facilities. The Theatre For Life program offers professional development through the theatre arts to individuals businesses and community organizations. NHTP also rents our facility to other community organizations who offer educational programs for all ages.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: NHTP tours the Elephant-in-the-Room Series throughout New Hampshire and other New England states presenting playreadings films and facilitated discussions about stigmatizing social issues of critical importance.

IRS990ScheduleG.ExplanationIfNoTxt: Gaming activities are conducted through Oceanfront Gaming per New Hampshire state law for charitable gaming.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: | LinenumberReference:,Explaination:| Part III line 9b,Gaming activities are conducted through Oceanfront Gaming per New Hampshire state law for charitable gaming.|

| PartandLinenumber:,Explanation:| Part III Line 16,New Hampshire Theatre Project is the recipient of charitable gaming monies from Oceanfront Gaming in Hampton Beach NH per NH State rules and regulations. New Hampshire Theatre Project does not conduct the games nor administer them in any way we simply receive the funds after state approval.|
Preparation by Administrative Coordinator review by Executive Director review by Treasurer and board finance committee.
Any transaction which might involve a board member or key employee must be approved by the Treasurer and or brought to the full board for approval if necessary.
Documents are available online and in hard copy on request. Also available on Guidestar.
